level.heading: Exemptions.
level.text: ยง 20-322 Exemptions. The provisions of this subchapter shall not apply to the maintenance, operation or conduct of a garage or parking lot: a. by the city or any agency thereof; b. in conjunction with a business for the exclusive accommodation of patrons of such business or the employees of such business; or c. by the owner or lessee of a multiple dwelling for the exclusive accommodation of the tenants or residents of such multiple dwelling.
